Youth Has Moved To Wednesdays

Attention! As of today, Wednesday, October 5th, Youth will meet on Wednesdays from 7-9pm. We usually start of with a game or two, have some snacks, and then dig into God’s word. Join us!

If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.
